name: Spike (Compute)
overview: An outstanding arcade-style game in the vein of Amidar. Only the skillful can evade the random power spikes and escape the grid. Published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1983/12 (Issue #6), COMPUTE!'s Second Book of Commodore 64,Your Commodore 1986/02, Digital Marketing PD #082, as well as Your Commodore 1986/02.
